Package vtracker.data

Class StatsBuilder

Object
vtracker.data.StatsBuilder
public class StatsBuilder
extends Object
This class provides methods for calculating win percentages. Uses VtrackerDatabase and String array of agent names for operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    StatsBuilder​(VtrackerDatabase db, String[] agents)
    Class constructor specifying database and list of agents.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculateStats()
    Calculates win percentages for all agents and updates internal data structure.
    double getOverallWinPercentage()
    Returns overall win percentage.
    java.util.Hashtable<String,​Double> getStats()
    Returns a Hashtable of agents and their win percentages.
    void refresh()
    Updates internal data structure of matches by querying database.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • StatsBuilder

      public StatsBuilder​(VtrackerDatabase db, String[] agents)
      Class constructor specifying database and list of agents.
      Parameters:
      db - a database containing matches
      agents - a string array containing name of agents

  • Method Details

    • calculateStats

      public void calculateStats()
      Calculates win percentages for all agents and updates internal data structure.

    • getStats

      public java.util.Hashtable<String,​Double> getStats()
      Returns a Hashtable of agents and their win percentages.
      Returns:
      a hashtable containing agents and win percentages

    • getOverallWinPercentage

      public double getOverallWinPercentage()
      Returns overall win percentage. Calculates win percentage of current matches and returns the result as a double representation.
      Returns:
      a double representing win percentage

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Updates internal data structure of matches by querying database.
